publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Malachi 1

l.foreign: מַשָא דְבַר יְהֹוָה אֶל יִשְרָאֵל בְיַד מַלְאָכִי

ab.l: Navilik śoźu H-nyn Jiśraʾeĺ üč́uń qolu ašyra Malʾaḫiniń.
Śuv́d́um siźni ajtty H da ajtasyz ńe byla śuv́d́uj biźni t́uv́uĺḿo qarandaš ʿĖsav Jaʿaqovɣa alej ajtty H da śuv́d́um Jaʿaqovnu.
Da ʿĖsavny ḥor ėt́tim da qojdum tavlaryn v́eŕań da üĺuš́uń azdaɣalarɣa midbarda.

Ajtsada ʾĖdom jarlylandym da qajtyrbyz da qondaryrbyz v́eŕań bolɣan orunlarny bolej ⟨alej⟩ ajtty Jehova jaratuvču č́eriv́ĺarniń alar qondaryrlar da ḿeń buzarmyn da atarlar alar- ɣa č́egi qynɣyrlyḥnyn da ol ulus ki ḥor ėt́ti any H dunjaɣa d́ejiń.
Da ḱoźĺarijiź ḱoŕarĺar da siź ajtyrsyz ulɣajdy H č́egi üśt́uńa Jiśraʾeĺniń.

Uvul syjlejdyr atany da qul bijiń da ėger ata ėśa ḿeń qajdadyr syjym da ėger bij ėśa ḿeń qajdadyr qorḥuvum ajtty H č́evaʾot siźǵa ol koheńĺar ḥorlavčular šemimni da ajtasyz ńe byla ḥorladyḥ šemijni.
Juvutasyz miźb́eaḥym üśt́uńa byrčlanɣan ėt́ḿak da ajtasyz ńe byla byrčladyḥ śeni ajtḥanyjyzda stolu H-nyn ḥorlan- ɣandyr ol.

Da ki juvutsejyz soqurnu d́eb́eḥa ėt́ḿa t́uv́uĺḿo jaman da ki juvutsalar aḥsaḥny da ḥastany t́uv́uĺḿo jaman juvutujuz ėńdi any
aɣalyɣyja qabul ėt́armo any h́em juź ėt́armo juźĺarija ajtty Jehova T́eńrisi č́evaʾotnun.
Da haĺegińa qolujuz ėńdi qyblalaryn T́eńriniń šeḿa ḥajyfsunur biźni qolujuzdan bu juź ėt́armo siźǵa juźĺarǵa ajt- ty H T́eńrisi č́eriv́ĺarniń.
Kim daɣy siźd́ań da b́ekĺasiń ėšikĺarni jandyr- masḥa ot miźb́eaḥym da muft joḥtur kĺagim ḿenim siźd́a ajtty H č́evaʾot da tirkini qolujuzdan qabul ėt́ḿammiń.
Ki qujaš balquvundan ėńuv́uńa d́ejiń ulludur šemim ḥanlyḥlarda da bar orunda t́ut́u juvu- tulɣan šemiḿa da aruv tirki ki ulludur šemim ḥanlyḥlarda ajtty H T́eńrisi č́eriv́ĺarniń.
Da siź jeńgiĺ ėt́asiź syjymny ajtḥanyjyzda stolu H-nyn byrčlanɣan ol da śoźu koheńniń jerińčidir ḥorlanɣan qarbany anyn.

Da ajtasyz muna jadamaḥ da tašlejsyz any ajtty H č́evaʾot da keĺtiŕasiź talaɣanny da aḥsaḥny da ol ḥastany da keĺtiŕasiź ol tirkini qabul ėt́ar-
ḿońḿo any qolujuzdan ajtty H.

Da qarɣyšlydyr qyzɣanuvču da baŕeśa b́u- ĺagińd́a ėrḱak da nijet́ ėt́adir da d́eb́eḥa ėt́adir čejpalɣan ajyplyny H-ɣa ki ullu bij ḿeń ajtty H T́eńrisi č́evaʾotnun da šemim qorḥunč- ludur ḥanlyḥlar arasyna.

app.note: F305-90: the copyist has surrounded the word with a circle to indicate that it was written by mistake.
F305-90: spelled miźb́eaḥymd́a; a scribal error.
F305-90: spelled t́erkini; a scribal error.
F305-90: spelled ėt́armonmo; a scribal error.
